title: Cant change email and password
body: I have access to my username and password , but i go to settings and try to change my email (the current one is unverified) , i put in my password , and it says its incorrect , but i just logged in. i sent a ticket , please help. this all started from me logging in the client and  being notified that i HAVE to change my password , so i do so.

replies.body:
Since you've already submitted a support ticket, I suggest waiting for an account specialist to get back to you on your ticket. The specialist will have far more context after looking through your account information and be able to work with you to resolve this.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
